name: iron-barbs
caption: Iron Barbs

effect.short: Damages attacking Pokémon for 1/8 their max [HP]{mechanic:hp} on contact.
effect.full:
Whenever a move makes contact with this Pokémon, the move's user takes 1/8 of its maximum [HP]{mechanic:hp} in damage.

This ability functions identically to []{ability:rough-skin}.

flavorText:
Inflicts damage to the attacker on contact with
iron barbs.
